extendedInfo.description: Take the AMA Driver Education Learner's Licence Practice Exam and sharpen your skills in preparation for your Alberta Class 7 Learnerâs Licence exam. Youâll be challenged with hundreds of Alberta-based questions from every category in the Alberta Driverâs Handbook. - Perfect for anyone wanting to practice for their learner's licence exam - Take the practice exam as many times as you want in a safe, risk-free environment - Each exam is different (30 randomly selected questions each time), providing you with access to a variety of questions - New questions are added regularly This practice exam is for study purposes only. â¨The actual Alberta Class 7 Learnerâs Licence exam may differ from this practice exam in form and content. Visit http://www.ama.ab.ca for more information. NOTE: The exam works off-line (without a wifi or 3G connection) but a connection is required to review the online handbook. AMA uses Google Analytics to gather information about how our apps are used. At no time do we track or collect any Personally Identifiable Information or share any of the gathered information with a third party other than Google. By using this app you are consenting to this activity by AMA. Detailed information on Google Analytics privacy policy can be found at http://www.google.com/analytics/tos.html.

reviews.title: Passed.
reviews.comment: Same questions get repeated a lot until eventually you get a 100% on all of them. I passed the actual exam using this and a few other apps,  the book is useless tbh.
reviews.author: Hani Hasan

reviews.comment: i love ths app definetly helpful.
reviews.author: Ayesha Shehzad

reviews.title: Better off to read the book.
reviews.comment: I took my learners and passed. No questions wrong. No questions skipped.   I did use this as a fast study and brush up after reading the book but I also read the the book way more. Dont rely on just the questions to pass because it WONT work for you than.  Learn the book word for word and your set. This was great for having the book in it though! Definitely a 2in1 deal
reviews.author: Cassidy Sander

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This is a really helpful crisp app. If you are going for your learners get this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 2in1
reviews.comment: This is brilliant. Handbook and reviewer in one package!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Bull crap it keeps saying that its wrong I know that it is right because I looked at my drivers book after I did this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love this app
reviews.comment: I\'ve never had a problem I used to have an log optimist one and I didn\'t have problems on there either just plz make it more like the test where you can skip answers. Thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its a good useful app but if you select an answer and change it, then you keep your original answer, i failed because it wouldnt accept my new answer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent for learning
reviews.comment: I used this previously on an iPod and loved it,  I was glad I could find it here too :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Too easy for the test. Leave you unprepared, better off reading the booklet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I practiced with this past first time, most of the questions that Are on the test are on here more or less. Great app
reviews.author: Lanny Ross

reviews.title: blah this is useful
reviews.comment: only so far. but ut will help me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I used just this and passed 1st time, its really easy to use however you need a internet connection for the actual book
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but...
reviews.comment: If you change your selected answer before proceeding, it will show the change but will use your first choice no matter what. Small bug, doesn\'t reflect on the overall app. Very happy with it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanx
reviews.comment: This is how i practised for my learners and past with flying colors!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: None of the questions are the same!
reviews.comment: If you are going to study for your learners use the booklet.
reviews.author: Daylan McGillivray
